title: Prince of Persia Warrior Within Soundtrack (OST)
description:
Composed by Stuart Chatwood. It offers a mix of genres between Arabic elements and Hard Rock.
You will find all 32 pieces from the game + the installation music for PC gamers (although the same piece can be heard, indistinctly, early within the game).
